verses.verse: And if<WH3588> a soul<WH5315> sin,<WH2398> and hear<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of swearing,<WH423> and is a witness,<WH5707> whether<WH176> he hath seen<WH7200> or<WH176> known<WH3045> of it; if<WH518> he do not<WH3808> utter<WH5046> it, then he shall bear<WH5375> his iniquity.<WH5771>

Or <WH176> if a soul<WH5315> touch<WH5060> any<WH3605> unclean<WH2931> thing,<WH1697> whether<WH176> it be a carcass<WH5038> of an unclean<WH2931> beast,<WH2416> or<WH176> a carcass<WH5038> of unclean<WH2931> cattle,<WH929> or<WH176> the carcass<WH5038> of unclean<WH2931> creeping things,<WH8318> and if it be hidden<WH5956> from<WH4480> him; he<WH1931> also shall be unclean,<WH2931> and guilty.<WH816>

Or <WH176> if<WH3588> he touch<WH5060> the uncleanness<WH2932> of man,<WH120> whatsoever<WH3605> uncleanness<WH2932> it be that<WH834> a man shall be defiled<WH2930> withal, and it be hid<WH5956> from<WH4480> him; when he<WH1931> knoweth<WH3045> of it, then he shall be guilty.<WH816>

Or <WH176> if<WH3588> a soul<WH5315> swear,<WH7650> pronouncing<WH981> with his lips<WH8193> to do evil,<WH7489> or<WH176> to do good,<WH3190> whatsoever<WH3605> <WH834> it be that a man<WH120> shall pronounce<WH981> with an oath,<WH7621> and it be hid<WH5956> from<WH4480> him; when he<WH1931> knoweth<WH3045> of it, then he shall be guilty<WH816> in one<WH259> of these.<WH4480> <WH428>
And it shall be,<WH1961> when<WH3588> he shall be guilty<WH816> in one<WH259> of these<WH4480> <WH428> things, that he shall confess<WH3034> that<WH834> he hath sinned<WH2398> in<WH5921> that thing:

And he shall bring<WH935> <WH853> his trespass offering<WH817> unto the LORD<WH3068> for<WH5921> his sin<WH2403> which<WH834> he hath sinned,<WH2398> a female<WH5347> from<WH4480> the flock,<WH6629> a lamb<WH3776> or<WH176> a kid<WH8166> of the goats,<WH5795> for a sin offering;<WH2403> and the priest<WH3548> shall make an atonement<WH3722> for<WH5921> him concerning his sin.<WH4480> <WH2403>

And if<WH518> he be not<WH3808> able to bring<WH5060> <WH3027> <WH1767> a lamb,<WH7716> then he shall bring<WH935> <WH853> for his trespass,<WH817> which<WH834> he hath committed,<WH2398> two<WH8147> turtledoves,<WH8449> or<WH176> two<WH8147> young<WH1121> pigeons,<WH3123> unto the LORD;<WH3068> one<WH259> for a sin offering,<WH2403> and the other<WH259> for a burnt offering.<WH5930>

And he shall bring<WH935> them unto<WH413> the priest,<WH3548> who shall offer<WH7126> <WH853> that which<WH834> is for the sin offering<WH2403> first,<WH7223> and wring off<WH4454> <WH853> his head<WH7218> from<WH4480> <WH4136> his neck,<WH6203> but shall not<WH3808> divide it asunder: <WH914>

And he shall sprinkle<WH5137> of the blood<WH4480> <WH1818> of the sin offering<WH2403> upon<WH5921> the side<WH7023> of the altar;<WH4196> and the rest<WH7604> of the blood<WH1818> shall be wrung out<WH4680> at<WH413> the bottom<WH3247> of the altar:<WH4196> it<WH1931> is a sin offering.<WH2403>

And he shall offer<WH6213> the second<WH8145> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> according to the manner:<WH4941> and the priest<WH3548> shall make an atonement<WH3722> for<WH5921> him for his sin<WH4480> <WH2403> which<WH834> he hath sinned,<WH2398> and it shall be forgiven<WH5545> him.

But if<WH518> he be not<WH3808> able to bring<WH5381> <WH3027> two<WH8147> turtledoves,<WH8449> or<WH176> two<WH8147> young<WH1121> pigeons,<WH3123> then he that<WH834> sinned<WH2398> shall bring<WH935> <WH853> for his offering<WH7133> the tenth part<WH6224> of an ephah<WH374> of fine flour<WH5560> for a sin offering;<WH2403> he shall put<WH7760> no<WH3808> oil<WH8081> upon<WH5921> it, neither<WH3808> shall he put<WH5414> any frankincense<WH3828> thereon:<WH5921> for<WH3588> it<WH1931> is a sin offering.<WH2403>

Then shall he bring<WH935> it to<WH413> the priest,<WH3548> and the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH7061> his handful<WH4393> <WH7062> of<WH4480> it, even<WH853> a memorial<WH234> thereof, and burn<WH6999> it on the altar,<WH4196> according to<WH5921> the offerings made by fire<WH801> unto the LORD:<WH3068> it<WH1931> is a sin offering.<WH2403>

And the priest<WH3548> shall make an atonement<WH3722> for<WH5921> him as touching<WH5921> his sin<WH2403> that<WH834> he hath sinned<WH2398> in one<WH4480> <WH259> of these,<WH4480> <WH428> and it shall be forgiven<WH5545> him: and the remnant shall be<WH1961> the priest's,<WH3548> as a meat offering.<WH4503>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

If <WH3588> a soul<WH5315> commit<WH4603> a trespass,<WH4604> and sin<WH2398> through ignorance,<WH7684> in<WH4480> the holy things<WH6944> of the LORD;<WH3068> then he shall bring<WH935> <WH853> for his trespass<WH817> unto the LORD<WH3068> a ram<WH352> without blemish<WH8549> out of<WH4480> the flocks,<WH6629> with thy estimation<WH6187> by shekels<WH8255> of silver,<WH3701> after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> for a trespass offering: <WH817>

And he shall make amends<WH7999> for the harm that he hath done<WH834> <WH2398> in<WH4480> the holy thing,<WH6944> and shall add<WH3254> the fifth part<WH2549> thereto,<WH5921> and give<WH5414> it unto the priest:<WH3548> and the priest<WH3548> shall make an atonement<WH3722> for<WH5921> him with the ram<WH352> of the trespass offering,<WH817> and it shall be forgiven<WH5545> him.

And if<WH518> a soul<WH5315> sin,<WH2398> and commit<WH6213> any<WH259> of these things<WH4480> <WH3605> which<WH834> are forbidden<WH3808> to be done<WH6213> by the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD;<WH3068> though he knew<WH3045> it not,<WH3808> yet is he guilty,<WH816> and shall bear<WH5375> his iniquity.<WH5771>

And he shall bring<WH935> a ram<WH352> without blemish<WH8549> out of<WH4480> the flock,<WH6629> with thy estimation,<WH6187> for a trespass offering,<WH817> unto<WH413> the priest:<WH3548> and the priest<WH3548> shall make an atonement<WH3722> for<WH5921> him concerning<WH5921> his ignorance<WH7684> wherein<WH834> he erred<WH7683> and knew<WH3045> it not,<WH3808> and it shall be forgiven<WH5545> him.
It <WH1931> is a trespass offering:<WH817> he hath certainly trespassed<WH816> <WH816> against the LORD.<WH3068>
